song_analysis.title: Lo-fi Girl
song_analysis.lyrical_themes: Daily hustle, overcoming obstacles, staying true to oneself, self-worth
song_analysis.instrumentation: Drums, bass, sampled melody (likely piano or keyboard), vocal samples
song_analysis.character_description: The main character is a stylish young woman with long purple hair, wearing a graphic tee and high-waisted jeans.

scenes.scene_setting: Rooftop overlooking a bustling city at sunset
scenes.video_prompt: A young woman with long purple hair sits on the edge of a rooftop at sunset, overlooking a vibrant city. She's wearing a graphic tee and high-waisted jeans. The city lights begin to twinkle as the sun dips below the horizon. She bobs her head in time to the music, lost in thought.
scenes.image_prompt: Young woman with long purple hair sitting on a rooftop, vibrant city sunset in the background, contemplative expression. Synthwave vaporwave color palette, digital painting style.
scenes.scene_description: The character reflects on her day while overlooking the city.
scenes.action: Sitting, contemplating, head bobbing to the music

scenes.scene_setting: A cozy, cluttered bedroom with fairy lights and posters
scenes.video_prompt: The same young woman is now in her bedroom, surrounded by fairy lights, posters, and stacks of books. She's sitting at her desk, working on a laptop, with headphones on. A cat jumps onto the desk and rubs against her arm. She smiles and pets the cat before returning to her work.
scenes.image_prompt: Cozy bedroom interior, fairy lights, posters, young woman at desk with laptop and cat, warm color palette. Synthwave vaporwave color palette, digital painting style.
scenes.scene_description: The character is working on her laptop in a comfortable home environment, with a cat providing a moment of levity.

scenes.scene_setting: Nighttime city street with neon lights and light rain
scenes.video_prompt: The young woman walks down a nighttime city street, the neon lights reflecting off the wet pavement. Light rain falls. She's holding an umbrella and listening to music on her headphones, a slight smile on her face. She passes a street artist creating a mural.
scenes.image_prompt: Nighttime city street, neon lights reflecting on wet pavement, light rain, young woman with umbrella and headphones, street art mural in background. Synthwave vaporwave color palette, digital painting style.
scenes.scene_description: The character immerses herself in the vibrant energy of the city at night, finding beauty in the rain.
scenes.action: Walking, listening to music, observing street art
